location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.198 of 1850 from Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter reports the death of Syed Humood ben Azan [Said Hamood bin Azan] of Sohar [Suhar] at Muscat, on 23 April. Azan died as a result of the heat and fever suffered while incarcerated by the Sultan of Muscat (see f 5).
